trans-unit.source: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示的列中显示数据的项的视图模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The GridView class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control in a series of columns.
trans-unit.target: GridView 类及其支持的类提供的基础结构来显示为指定的数据项目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>一系列的列中的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 这些列具有列标题，这两个派生自的按钮<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>，和可以对列重新排序通过使用拖放操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Note that the columns of a GridView display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，一个 GridView 的列显示数据，并且不提供直接访问权限的数据源。

trans-unit.source: To specify a GridView as the view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property to a GridView object.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定为的视图模式的 GridView <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>GridView 对象的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The GridView class is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: GridView 类派生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: You can define custom views by inheriting from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase> class that provides the supporting elements for a view.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过继承定义自定义视图<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>为视图提供了支持的元素的类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 为 ListView 创建自定义视图模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> that uses a GridView.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示的示例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>使用 GridView。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") The columns in a GridView are defined as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects.
trans-unit.target: ![具有 GridView 输出的 ListView](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "具有 GridView 输出的 ListView") GridView 中的列定义为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects as child elements of the GridView.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，你可以定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>对象作为子元素的 GridView。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: In code, you can add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> to the GridView by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property and the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method that is defined for the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，你可以将添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>到使用的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>属性和<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>方法定义<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>类</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>的</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>GridView</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can use other <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> methods such as <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> to modify the columns in a GridView.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以使用其他<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>等方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>修改 GridView 中的列。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define the columns of a GridView.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义一个 GridView 的列。

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-cs[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/listviewcode/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] To style the rows in a GridView, define a style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)][!code-cs[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)][!code-vb[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/listviewcode/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn) ]若要在一个 GridView 中的样式的行，定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>中的控件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>的样式

trans-unit.source: To add visual elements, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control, to a GridView, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加视觉元素，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控件，与一个 GridView，使用模板或样式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[如何︰ 创建具有复选框的 ListViewItems](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The column to add
trans-unit.target: 要添加的列

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: Text cannot be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: 无法将文本添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法将导致异常。

trans-unit.source: Text string
trans-unit.target: 文本字符串

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether columns in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> can be reordered by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否列在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>可以通过拖放操作重新排序。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns can be reordered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以对列重新排序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Removes all settings, bindings, and styling from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有设置、 绑定和样式从<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A> that is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, in addition to any styling that was applied to it by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以删除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A>关联<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>，除了已应用于它的任何样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to clear.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>清除。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: 标识 ColumnCollectionProperty 附加属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: ColumnCollectionProperty 附加属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于列标题的样式。

trans-unit.source: The ColumnHeaderContainerStyle property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property are both used to define the visual tree for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects that represent the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: ColumnHeaderContainerStyle 属性并<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>同时用于定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>对象，表示一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>中的列标题</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>的可视化树属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ColumnHeaderContainerStyle property can also define column header content when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> is not by specified by defining a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> object.
trans-unit.target: ColumnHeaderContainerStyle 属性还可以定义列标题时内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>未通过指定通过定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示多种方式来设置布局和设置列标题的样式之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 当设置样式时，有一些限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`标识所请求的样式的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 键指一种<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中的现有资源

trans-unit.target: 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用，或也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个复合字符串，指定如何设置格式的列标题<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>如果显示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置，则将忽略此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。

trans-unit.source: If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了多个属性，使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式化列标题。

trans-unit.source: The format for a column can be set on several types.
trans-unit.target: 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - ColumnHeaderStringFormat - - ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示可用于格式化列标题，按从低到高优先级的顺序排列的属性:-ColumnHeaderStringFormat- - # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为**true**|None|

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: 一个复合字符串，指定如何设置格式的列标题<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>如果显示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template to use to display the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于显示列标题的模板。

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeaderTemplate property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the ColumnHeaderTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ColumnHeaderTemplate 属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>都设置属性、 ColumnHeaderTemplate 属性优先。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示多种方式来设置布局和设置列标题的样式之一。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use to display the column headers as part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref>要用于显示列标题的一部分<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selector object that provides logic for selecting a template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于选择要用于每个列标题的模板提供逻辑的选择器对象。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property for all columns if it is defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，默认逻辑是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>如果已定义的所有列的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>都设置属性和 ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector 属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示多种方式来设置布局和设置列标题的样式之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值`ResourceExtension`以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey` The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey`标识所请求的选择器实现的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 键指实现实用的派生类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to the application resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加的实例你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>作为应用程序资源字典资源的类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation` A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation`从派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>实现实用的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip that appears when the mouse pointer pauses over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当鼠标指针悬停在某个列标题时显示工具提示的内容。

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示多种方式来设置布局和设置列标题的样式之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values `toolTipContent` A string that becomes the display text for the ColumnHeaderToolTip.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` - or - ``` # # XAML 值`toolTipContent`变为 ColumnHeaderToolTip 显示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: `toolTipObjectContent` An object to use as the content for the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: `toolTipObjectContent`要用作工具提示的内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that defines a layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, such as a text element.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，此对象是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或定义的布局的其他某个元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>，例如文本元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: In this usage, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种用法，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>元素是隐式创建从已分析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，和`toolTipObjectContent`内容设置为其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.target: `ToolTip`.../> See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This property lets you modify the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, by using methods that are inherited from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class, such as the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> methods.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> control that encloses the content that is displayed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于引用为定义的样式的键<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>包含显示的内容的控件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用在此只读的静态属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过将其静态值分配给另一个属性值。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，此属性的静态值定义用于查找默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>样式的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>的资源键

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新定义此样式，通过引用 GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey [X:static 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)并分配此值[X:key 指令](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)的新<xref:System.Windows.Style>。</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用此方法若要更改的列集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取、 设置或更改为定义的列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>对象，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> object to assign.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref>要分配的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否序列化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>附加属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: The object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> is set.
trans-unit.target: 其上的对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>必须序列化; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指示的列数<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>。
